first.name: King
first.message:
Noble champion, I have for you an important task.
The guardians of the Pentagonal Table have united under the banner of "The Fourth Order" and are terrorizing my kingdom.

third.name: King
third.message: This will be no easy task. In order to defeat these masters of the elements, you will need to learn them yourself.

fourth.name: King
fourth.message:
Will you become a deadly Ranger, mortally wounding your foes with pinpointed strikes?
Or a sturdy Paladin, able to withstand injuries with the help of healing steam?
Perhaps a mysterious Wizard, manipulating the physical world using masonic secrets?
Or still yet a clever Alchemist, concocting alchemical poisons to weaken your foes?
If not then maybe a stealthy Rogue, capitalizing on your enemy's surprise?

fifth.name: Knight
fifth.message: That's a difficult question. I think I want to be...

options.message: I'm not sure... can you repeat that?

ranger.name: Knight
ranger.message: My aim is true. Ranger it is!

paladin.name: Knight
paladin.message: No enemy can fell me as a righteous Paladin!

wizard.name: Knight
wizard.message: I will discover ancient secrets as a Wizard!

alchemist.name: Knight
alchemist.message: None will be impervious to my Alchemist concoctions!

rogue.name: Knight
rogue.message: Nobody will expect me if I go Rogue!

end.name: King
end.message: Excellent. I wish you luck... the fate of this kingdom lies in your hands!
